attributes.action: ban fireworks from public sale to protect against health and safety
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this fireworks night two children put a firework through a letter box, which caught the house on fire, a mother and son were in this house, the mother died leaving her injured son to escape the blaze now without a mother, how many more times do we need to see this happen or other wreckless ideas kids have when fireworks are being sold?! these fireworks should only be used in a supervised professional display where it is safe enough for everyone to enjoy and where money goes to charity!
